propertyType.name: ignitionSenseThresholdVolts
wifi
propertyType.info:
[ { "type": "tooltip", "iconType": "information", "filled": false, "text": "

Please ensure all antennas are properly installed on the Wi-Fi Module  
If the Wi-Fi Mode is WGB also enable WGB as an Uplink in the WAN Uplink section

", "placement": "right-start" }, { "type": "banner", "iconType": "warning", "filled": true, "flavor": null, "text": "

Minimum Software version on the IR1800 is 17.10.1a and for the Wi-Fi Module is 17.9.2  
For more information on the Wi-Fi mode, please visit IoT OD Documentation  

", "border": true, "closeButton": true, "placement": null } ]

services_ciscocybervision
propertyType.info: [ { "type": "banner", "iconType": "information", "filled": true, "flavor": null, "text": "Cisco Cyber Vision requires prerequisite configuration settings before it can be deployed on network devices. The option below prepares the network devices for deployement, but does not automatically deploy Cyber Vision on the group network devices.", "border": true, "closeButton": true, "placement": null } ]
